code: import api from'./api';export const getDiscounts=async function(){let pageNumber=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let pageSize=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;let searchTerm=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;let isActive=arguments.length>3?arguments[3]:undefined;const response=await api.get('/discounts',{params:{pageNumber,pageSize,searchTerm,isActive}});return response.data;};export const getDiscount=async id=>{const response=await api.get(`/discounts/${id}`);return response.data.data;};export const createDiscount=async discount=>{const response=await api.post('/discounts',discount);return response.data.data;};export const updateDiscount=async(id,discount)=>{const response=await api.put(`/discounts/${id}`,discount);return response.data.data;};export const deleteDiscount=async id=>{const response=await api.delete(`/discounts/${id}`);return response.data.success;};
